content: decrease-psso k1 yo k2 p1 k1 the horseshoe pattern also from walker s treasury of row 7 repeat row 5 knitting patterns is a nice simple lace pattern that forms a slight scallop at the cast on edge row 8 k1 p1 k3 yo sl 1-k2 decrease-psso yo k3 p1 k1 repeat row 1 - 8 ten more times bind off sl1-k2tog-psso yo p on rs k on ws k on rs p on ws www tricksyknitter com patterns and tricks to help you knit
